医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新项目旨在通过数字双胞胎彻底改变中风治疗这听起来像是科幻电影中的场景。通过对脑梗塞或脑出血患者的数字双胞胎进行手术来评估其最佳治疗方法。如果由阿姆斯特丹联合医学中心的研究人员决定，这将在六年内成为现实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/New-project-aims-to-revolutionize-中风-治疗-with-digital-twins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/New-project-aims-to-revolutionize-中风-治疗-with-digital-twins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa46b740-6b2a-4d3f-a27b-c14f5bc74c7d Thu, 07 Dec 2023 20:19:07 -0500 New project aims to revolutionize stroke treatment with digital twins
研究发现儿童保育补贴要求与虐待儿童率之间存在联系密歇根大学的一项新研究发现，如果父母无法获得足够的儿童保育补贴，低收入家庭的幼儿可能面临虐待和忽视的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-finds-link- Between-child-care-subsidy-requirements-and-child-abuse-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-finds-link- Between-child-care-subsidy-requirements-and-child-abuse-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc68ebe7-f568-46af-b7c6-22edaee8a16a Thu, 07 Dec 2023 20:08:18 -0500 Study finds link between child care subsidy requirements and child abuse rates
UTA 获得 110 万美元拨款，用于培训研究人员健康数学和计算方法美国国家科学基金会 (NSF) 向德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校提供 110 万美元拨款，用于培训和指导数学和计算技术领域的三个多层次跨学科研究人员，以解决癌症生物学、计算神经学和媒介传播疾病方面的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/UTA-receives-2411-million-grant-to-train-researchers-in-mathematical-and-computational-methods-for-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/UTA-receives-2411-million-grant-to-train-researchers-in-mathematical-and-computational-methods-for-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0764931f-d74c-4ecb-a46f-10a465593ea2 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 19:41:58 -0500 UTA receives $1.1 million grant to train researchers in mathematical and computational methods for health
肝脏触发剂是促进基因治疗成功的关键印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员发现了关于肝脏触发因素的重要见解，该触发因素可以阻止基因治疗产生的不良免疫反应，令人惊讶地导致特定免疫细胞的激活，尽管肝脏在抑制免疫反应方面发挥着典型作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Liver-trigger-holds-the-key-to-boosting-gene-therapy-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Liver-trigger-holds-the-key-to-boosting-gene-therapy-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fcc7c71-958b-47bf-b645-b484f20b8a81 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 19:36:59 -0500 Liver trigger holds the key to boosting gene therapy success
大语言模型增强鉴别诊断，为人工智能辅助医疗决策铺平道路研究探索优化用于鉴别诊断 (DDx) 的大语言模型 (LLM)，展示其在利用真实世界医疗案例协助临床医生进行准确疾病诊断方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Large-language-models-enhance- Differential-diagnosis-paving-the-way-for-AI-auxiliary-medical-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Large-language-models-enhance- Differential-diagnosis-paving-the-way-for-AI-auxiliary-medical-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7783af9-18b9-482a-85e0-331c175199c1 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 19:05:00 -0500 Large language models enhance differential diagnosis, paving the way for AI-assisted medical decision-making
用于预防和治疗呼吸系统疾病的免疫调节纳米药物研究探索了用于呼吸道感染的免疫调节纳米药物，强调了它们在增强治疗效果和疫苗功效方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Immunoreregulatory-nanomedicines-for-the-prevention-and-treatment-of-respiratory-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Immunoreregulatory-nanomedicines-for-the-prevention-and-treatment-of-respiratory-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de82f1f5-c3ae-467f-b37e-7d1d3facadd4 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 18:56:00 -0500 Immunoregulatory nanomedicines for the prevention and treatment of respiratory diseases
研究揭露了社会对痤疮的耻辱和误解研究揭示了与痤疮相关的社会耻辱和负面刻板印象，强调需要提高对这种皮肤状况的认识和理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-exposes-societal-stigma-and-misconceptions-about-acne.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-exposes-societal-stigma-and-misconceptions-about-acne.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc21db42-e3ae-4d87-ba8c-1688eac7ec96 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 18:41:00 -0500 Study exposes societal stigma and misconceptions about acne
研究表明，扑热息痛和布洛芬对紧张型头痛同样有效《科学报告》中的系统回顾和荟萃分析发现，扑热息痛和布洛芬在治疗阵发性紧张型头痛方面没有显着差异，表明两者都是缓解疼痛的可行选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Paracetamol-and-ibuprofen-equally- effective-for-tension-type-headaches-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Paracetamol-and-ibuprofen-equally- effective-for-tension-type-headaches-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae31d135-f6d6-45fd-bb47-1c413bb6ac16 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 18:27:00 -0500 Paracetamol and ibuprofen equally effective for tension-type headaches, study reveals
与儿童失调相关的母亲炎症危险因素美国国立卫生研究院环境对儿童健康结果影响 (ECHO) 项目资助的一项研究表明，母亲炎症风险因素可能与儿童的失调有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Maternal-inflammation-risk-factors-linked-to-dysregulation-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Maternal-inflammation-risk-factors-linked-to-dysregulation-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=102c6206-ce01-4f19-a696-0e60fa9e04f6 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 15:20:14 -0500 Maternal inflammation risk factors linked to dysregulation in children
新机制导致脊髓性肌萎缩症运动神经元变性芝加哥安与罗伯特 H. 卢里儿童医院斯坦利曼尼儿童研究所的 Yongchao C. Ma 博士的实验室发现了一种导致脊髓性肌萎缩症 (SMA) 中运动神经元变性的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Novel-mechanism-leads-to-motor-neuron-degenesis-in-spinal-muscular-atropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Novel-mechanism-leads-to-motor-neuron-degenesis-in-spinal-muscular-atropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8848f282-4438-48cf-b6c4-d0421158d675 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 15:13:38 -0500 Novel mechanism leads to motor neuron degeneration in spinal muscular atrophy
